mapper.select: SELECT T.open_id, T.store_name, T.store_location, T.phone, T.business_license_no, T.shopkeeper_name FROM nideshop_store T WHERE open_id = #{openId}
mapper.insert: insert into nideshop_store( `open_id`, `store_name`, `store_location`, `phone`, `business_license_no`, `shopkeeper_name`) values( #{openId}, #{storeName}, #{storeLocation}, #{phone}, #{businessLicenseNo}, #{shopkeeperName} ) on duplicate key update `store_name`= values(storeName), `store_location`= values(storeLocation),`phone`= values(phone), `business_license_no`= values(businessLicenseNo),`shopkeeper_name`= values(shopkeeperName)
